name: A Game's Tale
storyline:
Dive into the world of this unique fantasy game and take the chance to find out why we play. You will fight tactical battels, all one-of-a-kind, with loads of different creatures to fight and play. All this happens in a welcoming, warm and beautiful world.

Choose your creatures and their abilities wisely for victory!

There are six classes of creatures. For every battle you need to choose different classes and creatures. If a game with a short but meaningful story, where every battle and character holds a new surprise for you sounds intriguing, A Game´s Tale is the right choice.

With every victory you grow your deck!

A Game´s Tale will be released on June 7, 2024.
summary: Welcome to "A Game's Tale”, where you´ll enjoy tactical battles, grow your deck as you travel through a fantasy world. While meeting charming characters along the way, you will discover the secret of why we play.
